issue_comments.body: Sorry for not noticing this for so long. Could you please supply a signed copy of the CLA available at http://www.sonatype.org/SonatypeCLA.pdf to manfred@sonatype.com or brianf@sonatype.com. Thank you.
This repo is no longer active.

commit_comments.body:
@b23prodtm adding pluginManagement and plugins are NOT the same. Please read up about the difference in the books.

Also Maven 2 is deprecated and should no longer be used. Please upgrade to Maven 3.

Hi ! I've read the Maven Guide published (in french translation). I'm trying to migrate to Maven from old Ant scripts. I want to use Assembly and other plugins. In any way, if it can help other developers reading this, I've got some errors upon building with the snippets and Maven2 (mvn2).
1) **Please add** the following tags around plugins in each of the pom.xml (parent and submodules)

```
pom.xml
<pluginManagement>
    <plugins>...</plugins>
</pluginManagement>
```

...with the pluginManagement tag, we will be able to compile on Maven 2 (this is the version I'm using). This is a major issue about these examples of POM.xml scripting.

2) There's no information about **where does Maven find the assembly.xml**. Instead I looked in Apache's Assembly references for the descriptor file and where it can be put : http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-assembly-plugin/usage.html

Regards,
Thank you a lot for your book !

```
                                                                                  OK , PluginManagement notifies that "children" pom.xml must inherit the Plugins configuration if it includes a Plugin definition of the parent pom.xml, now I understand better. I've been scripting a multi-module project. Thank you for the tip!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Envoyé de mon smartphone BlackBerry 10.                                                                                                                                                                                                                De: Manfred MoserEnvoyé: mardi 22 décembre 2015 17:18À: sonatype/maven-guide-enRépondre à: sonatype/maven-guide-enCc: b23production GNUObjet: Re: [maven-guide-en] Removed ruby plugin from list (68f8c29)@b23prodtm adding pluginManagement and plugins are NOT the same. Please read up about the difference in the books.
```

Also Maven 2 is deprecated and should no longer be used. Please upgrade to Maven 3.

—Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
